  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product​(int traderId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, float price, float discountedPrice, Category category) throws java.lang.Exception
      The constructor that initializes the product instance
      Parameters:
      traderId - the id of the trader that owner of the product
      name - the name of the product
      description - the description of the product
      price - the price of the product
      discountedPrice - the discounted of the product
      category - the category of the product
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the discountedPrice and price is not correct.
